original_text: But one day, their prisoners will laugh at them. The people will insult that proud nation with songs and proverbs. They will say, “You have stored for yourselves many valuable things that do not belong to you. It will be very bad for you! You have robbed other nations so that you can be rich. This will not continue much longer!” But one day, their prisoners will laugh at them. The people will insult that proud nation with songs and proverbs. They will say, “You have stored for yourselves many valuable things that do not belong to you. It will be very bad for you! You have robbed other nations so that you can be rich. This will not continue much longer!”
korean_text: 그 무리가 다 속담으로 그를 평론하며 조롱하는 시로 그를 풍자하지 않겠느냐 곧 이르기를 화 있을진저 자기 소유 아닌 것을 모으는 자여 언제까지 이르겠느냐 볼모 잡은 것으로 무겁게 짐진 자여

sentences.original_text: But one day, their prisoners will laugh at them.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 어느 날, 그들의 포로들이 그들을 비웃을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The people will insult that proud nation
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들은 그 오만한 민족을 모욕할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: with songs and proverbs.
They will say,
You have stored for yourselves
many valuable things
that do not belong to you.
It will be very bad for you!
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게 매우 나쁜 일이 생길 것입니다!

sentences.original_text: You have robbed other nations
so that you can be rich.
This will not continue much longer!
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 더 이상 오래 지속되지 않을 것입니다!

sentences.original_text: But one day, their prisoners will laugh at them.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 어느 날, 그들의 포로들이 그들을 비웃을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The people will insult that proud nation
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들은 그 오만한 민족을 모욕할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: with songs and proverbs.
They will say,
You have stored for yourselves
many valuable things
that do not belong to you.
It will be very bad for you!
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게 매우 나쁜 일이 생길 것입니다!

sentences.original_text: You have robbed other nations
so that you can be rich.
This will not continue much longer!
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 더 이상 오래 지속되지 않을 것입니다!
